title: Three Propositions
description: Homeless during the holidays?A bossy billionaire her only lifeline?A secret baby?Jasper Clark has spent his life, building a business and fortune. He’s controlled, intimidating, and does not believe in love or family. When he finds himself in need of a companion for holiday parties, he makes a proposition to a member of the cleaning staff at his club.Nena Blake is street-smart, sassy, foul-mouthed, and doesn’t care for Jasper’s bossy ways. He may be rich and handsome, but he offends her from the first time he opens his rich mouth. She denies his proposition until circumstances force her to accept his help. One proposition becomes three when Jasper refuses to let her go. Nena demolishes every one of his ridiculous rules, knowing her prince is the devil in disguise. Between bickering and passionate moments, everything changes until Nena is finally forced to make a choice that leaves them both miserable.Will Jasper come through in the end? Does a billionaire want love and family after all? Find out when you read this steamy, billionaire romance full of bantering and wicked desire.
author: Kristal Dawn Harris
